root.name: B.C.
root.description: B.C was a third-person combat game scheduled to be an Xbox exclusive title in which you played as a Caveman in a human tribe. It featured gruesome combat where the player must defend himself/herself against rival tribes and dinosaurs. Peter Molyneux and Lionhead Studios scrapped the project on Oct. 22, 2004; "The decision to suspend work on any games project is always a very difficult one, particularly when it is a title with the potential of BC," Lionhead's Peter Molyneux said in the brief announcement. "We hope to revive the project at a later date and will endeavor to assign as many of the team as possible to other Lionhead projects."
